channel.title: HDB: Haines's Data Blog

item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is a test post, let’s add some packages: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union Let’s add a query: Batting%>% filter(playerID=='ruthba01')%>% select(playerID,yearID,teamID,HR) ## playerID yearID teamID HR ## 1 ruthba01 1914 BOS 0 ## 2 ruthba01 1915 BOS 4 ## 3 ruthba01 1916 BOS 3 ## 4 ruthba01 1917 BOS 2 ## 5 ruthba01 1918 BOS 11 ## 6 ruthba01 1919 BOS 29 ## 7 ruthba01 1920 NYA 54 ## 8 ruthba01 1921 NYA 59 ## 9 ruthba01 1922 NYA 35 ## 10 ruthba01 1923 NYA 41 ## 11 ruthba01 1924 NYA 46 ## 12 ruthba01 1925 NYA 25 ## 13 ruthba01 1926 NYA 47 ## 14 ruthba01 1927 NYA 60 ## 15 ruthba01 1928 NYA 54 ## 16 ruthba01 1929 NYA 46 ## 17 ruthba01 1930 NYA 49 ## 18 ruthba01 1931 NYA 46 ## 19 ruthba01 1932 NYA 41 ## 20 ruthba01 1933 NYA 34 ## 21 ruthba01 1934 NYA 22 ## 22 ruthba01 1935 BSN 6
